entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [tvos][tests] InvalidIVSizes appears to be crashing System.Security.Cryptography.Tests on tvOS arm64 #76728
  • dotnet format command broke when PublishAot is enabled #76727
  • [wasm] Link all the documentation on wasm in the repo, in a single top level document #76722
  • [wasm] Improve experience of debugging library tests #76721
  • Wasm AOT can produce functions with too many parameters #76719
  • EventSourceLogger does not propagate SpanId and TraceId #76718
    8.0.0
  • [mono]build to generate nuget packages with -cmakeargs orrcured error on windows. #76717
  • Access Exception thrown on exit after opening OleDb connection to access database #76712
    Future
  • [wasm] mono_wasm_trace_logger doesn't display message in FireFox console #76710
    8.0.0
  • EventPipe events cannot always be read in realtime. #76704
  • [EnC] FieldInfo.GetValue on a newly-added ValueType field crashes CoreCLR #76702
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Microsoft.DotNet.CoreSetup.Test.HostActivation.StartupHooks.Muxer_activation* tests failed #76681
  • Installer build is too verbose #33218
    Future
  • Test failure: XDocumentTests.Streaming.XStreamingElementAPI.NestedXStreamingElementPlusIEnumerable #76636
    8.0.0
  • Failure in non-context-based hostfxr APIs can leave future calls waiting indefinitely #3571
    Future
  • Single-file: Handle PDB/Map files generated by R2R #3553
    Future
  • System.NullReferenceException when using System.Speech 7.0.0-rc.1.22426.10 from Windows Forms #75667
  • Clear/fix `compMethodReturnsMultiRegRetType` and similar functions. #36868
    Future
  • [System.IO.Hashing] crc32 hash does not match #76720
  • Buffer for enumerator #76675
  • Update .Net source generators to use new SyntaxValueProvider.ForAttributeWithMetadataName api. #70754
    7.0.0
  • Self-contained app crashes when placed in a path with backslashes in Unix #48259
    Future
  • System.AccessViolationException thrown by PrintDocument.Print when platform is X86 #76538
    7.0.0
  • Test failure readytorun/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism.sh #75501
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Tests.Vectors.Vector64Tests.Vector64UInt64ShiftLeftTest #76637
    8.0.0
  • Runtime_34937 and Runtime_33972 JITMinOpts test failures #76344
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT\\jit64\\opt\\lur\\lur_02\\lur_02.cmd #76507
    8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] `CompilerServer: fatal error - server reports different hash version than build task` on `linux-musl` when using mono-backed runtime #76543
  • [mono] Incorrect version comparison in the loader #76664
    7.0.0
  • Linq is missing some optimizations for readonly collections #76709
  • [Question] Architecture-independent libraries build #76598
  • Consider clearing JsonSerializerOptions.Caching cache using a timer, not just based on incoming calls #76548
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] [question] JSInterop usage with javascript 'buf' data type #76672
  • WASM CI failure: System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Http.Tests.HttpRequestMessageTest.BlobUri_Marshal_CorrectValues_Browser #76676
  • Support DOTNET_ROOT with dotnet.exe #3394
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Make NullabilityInfoContext static #76708
  • Simplify console output when runtime is missing #35697
    8.0.0
  • Unable to run hello world on ARM Linux #33034
    Future
  • SynthesizeRecognizeTests.SpeechSynthesizerToSpeechRecognitionEngine - NullReferenceException #76626
  • Single file bundle extraction misses feedback #3687
    Future
  • Chain.build() fails for custom certs in certain environments #75170
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't check handles in substitution #76730
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove GUID <=> string functions in PAL #76729
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Improve performance of integer formatting #76726
    area-System.Runtime
  • [test][tvos] Disable InvalidIVSizes overflow case for tvos #76725
    area-System.Security, os-tvos
  • Fix for GitHub issue 76673 and regression test - incorrect static virtual method resolution #76724
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use default emscripten cache for AOT tests, on windows #76723
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix JsonDocument thread safety. #76716
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Make sure isRunSmokeTestsOnly is false when manually triggering runtime-extra-platforms #76715
  • Devirtualize EqualityComparer for reference types #76714
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Properly handle filesizes larger than 8 Gb #76707
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • Add specific formatting string for SSA numbers #76706
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove libstdc++ dependency from NativeAOT #76705
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Test Only - Less aggressive instrumentation for Vector256 crash #76701
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Test Only - Revert SIMD related JIT PRs #76700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Fix incorrect version comparison in loader #76699
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.11
  • [release/7.0] [mono] Fix incorrect version comparison in loader #76698
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.0
  • Add null check before calling Path.GetFullPath #76696
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests: Use the default cache for emcc #76694
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono

Merged

  • Simplify handling of multi-reg returns #74499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • SPMI: Write out improvements/regressions breakdown details #76711
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Darc dependency entries for our dependencies on Roslyn #75617
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • Remove closed issues from issues.targets #75363
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono] Remove unused signature variable #76465
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: disable phi based redundant branch opts #76695
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Remove unused variable from mono_interp_transform_method #76713
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add GenTreeID in allocating registers table #76521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Lower `GetLower` nodes formed from `GetElement(0)` #76492
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] EmccExportedRuntimeMethod MSBuild item #76455
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Revert "Revert frozen RuntimeType objects and write barriers for frozen objects" #76649
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add portable linux source build leg #75546
  • [mono] Fix incorrect version comparison in loader #76665
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests: Split some test classes for better helix performance #76697
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Check for non-valid compare chains (#76566) #76662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update docs on libraries cross build #76614
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Rewrite the shared JsonSerializerOptions cache implementation. #76607
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Robustify speech recognition test #76652
    area-System.Speech
  • docs: add missing document to microsoft.extensions.options #76121
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Low memory fixes #76674
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Preference locals away from PUTARG_REG killed registers #76671
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use CCKeyDerivationPBKDF on iOS #76688
    area-System.Security, os-ios
  • [JIT] Cleanup, share more code between x86 and x64 in `genAllocLclFrame` #76647
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • JIT: import static readonly fields holding frozen objects as const handles #76112
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Reduce some allocations when emitting CFI code #76562
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improvements to CoreCLR Building, Debugging, and Testing Documentation #75569
    documentation, area-Meta
  • [No Review, WIP] Consume ApiCompat's ValidateAssemblies task #73263
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement Console.SetWindowSize() for linux #75824
    area-System.Console, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add RIDs for Tizen6.5 and 7.0 #76599
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add RIDs for Tizen 7.0 #76650
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add non-generic Create method to DispatchProxy #73046
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution, Future
  • Add readmes to reflection #76567
    documentation, area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Use normal VNs when adding NRE exception sets #76639
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Introduce a WASM JIT for interpreter opcodes #76477
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • [WIP] Support hot cold splitting in crossgen2 #74963
    NO-MERGE, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Failfast on Vector256 test failure #76656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Only R2R public methods, methods that override public methods, and internal methods that aren't always inlined #75793
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • [Release/7.0] Delete dangling thread session states #76691
    Servicing-approved, EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [IGNORE] [Experiment] Try to return MSBuild Server back. #76536
    NO-MERGE
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Abs intrinsics for Amd64 #76668
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Don't cache the Compilation object in steps in the interop source generators #76474
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Ensure source generated metadata properties are read-only. #76540
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Ensure we cleanup the marshalling for elements of collections (stateful and stateless) #76693
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Dot intrinsics for Amd64 #76239
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][interp] Optimize out some ldloca uses #76669
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Retire .NET 5 #69911
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Adding EVEX encoding support for emitOutputRRR(). #75934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Do not transform SIMD field access into HWIs in minopts, always fold local indirs to `LCL_FLD` #76491
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Disable NativeAOT subset for source-build. #76206
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use AzDO Pipeline Resources to define our build Docker containers #75473
    area-Infrastructure
  • API Dept - Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting #76692
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [wasm] [debugger] First version of multithreaded debugging #74820
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Vector128's Sum and Dot SIMD implementation #76446
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fix triple slash documentation for System.Runtime.Intrinsics #76687
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • [mono] Force AOT+interpreter for iOSSimulator arm64 library test local build #76551
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Require global opt-in for distributed transactions #76376
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-System.Transactions, new-api-needs-documentation, linkable-framework, 7.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Devirtualize ldarg(s)+callvirt where possible. #75748
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
  • [hot_reload] Add instance fields #76462
    area-EnC-mono
  • [release/6.0] Delete dangling thread session states #76431
    Servicing-approved, EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.11
  • [wasm] Rewrite interop in debugger tests #74990
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add Utf8JsonWriter.WriteRawValue(System.Buffers.ReadOnlySequence). #76444
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add initial support for Freebsd.arm64 #71486
    arch-arm64, os-freebsd, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • low memory fixes #76468
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Enable sourcelink in source-build #76685
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 7.O RTM Error #28373
  • Consider creating and publishing a package for FrameworkReference resolution #28364
  • Dependent projects building to same output dir fail to Rebuild #28355

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0.1xx] Disable msbuild server by default #28369
    Servicing-approved, Area-CLI, 7.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28366
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28367
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch to 7.0.2xx for loc build #28304
    Area-Infrastructure
  • normalize accessibility when not including internal symbols #28348
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Add warning when targeting 7.0 in 17.3 and remove 7.0 from the list of supported targets #28224
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Add missing EnableRuleAttributesMustMatch task property #28338
    Servicing-approved, Area-ApiCompat, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Update branding to 6.0.111 #28322
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add RuntimeSpecific #28376
    Area-External
  • Fix checking for updated workload packs in advertising manifests #28327
    Servicing-consider, Area-Workloads
  • Baseline Update for 6.0.306 #28346
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2013867 #27667
  • Read PackageDefinitions and PackageDependencies from the cache assets file instead of ResolvePackageDependencies #28263
    Area-Infrastructure
  • revert perma-escaping of semicolons and support semicolon-delimited unquoted property values #27859
    Bug, Servicing-approved, Area-CLI, DO NOT MERGE, 6.0.11

Issues

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve negation of relational patterns with numeric values in refactorings #64558
  • Don't infer a val escape on 'out scoped var' #64556
  • NFW reduction in external and internal releases #64550
    17.5 P1
  • StringSyntaxAttribute for params arguments only highlight the first argument #64549
    17.5
  • Unexpected value 'include' in azure-pipelines-integration.yml #64548
  • Telemetry to measure configuration switch actions in the language service #64547
    17.5 P1
  • `CSharpStructuredTriviaFormatEngine` should probably derive from `CSharpFormatEngine` instead of `AbstractFormatEngine` #64546
  • Fix up integration tests and make it required in PR validation #64545
    17.5 P1
  • Inline rename UI navigation from keyboard bugs #64544
    17.5 P1
  • DotNetSdkTests.TestDiscoverEditorAndGlobalConfigFilesCanBeDisabled is flaky #64542
  • Semantic snippets tests for razor integration #64541
    17.5 P1
  • Add functionality to code snippets to both be able to reference a different replacement and to then execute arbitrary logic on that replacement value #64540
  • C# go to implementation feature lists unsuitable implementations #64538
  • Completion insert `=` where it is not necessary #64531
    17.5
  • False positive CS8602 warning #64525

Closed

  • Add TargetFramework.Net70 #61463
    17.4
  • Remove `AssemblySymbol.RuntimeSupportsNumericIntPtr` once we add `TargetFramework.Net70` #61235
    17.5
  • VS refactor suggests an incorrect pattern matching for `!(a?b is true | false)` #64292
    Backlog
  • LSIF Generator cannot be run on non-windows machines. #64510
  • Intellisense does not recognize start of string, changes "D: to "Date: #64280
    Backlog
  • [bug] VSCode crashing with large XML and Markdown files. #64534
  • Formatting: no setting for spacing after target-typed new keyword, default formatting conflicts with StyleCop's SA1000 #64509
  • Error CS1508 is not pointing to Microsoft doc page #63515
  • Add the title, category and description fields into build diagnostics reported in error list #57377
    17.3
  • Ensure diagnostics from build are hookued up to the descriptor properties #47345
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33005.318 #64527
  • Missing ref safety error inside `foreach` #64218
    17.4
  • Add a new Location.Create overload for external file location with a different mappedLineSpan #64236
    17.4

PullRequests

Created

  • Build and run tests on .NET 7 #64560
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update publish data to test PR validation fix #64559
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Don't wait solution crawler in code action test #64557
    Area-IDE
  • Beef up resiliency of DeclareAsNullable fixer #64555
    Area-IDE
  • Publish pr validation packages #64554
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix regex detection for StringSyntax attribute on params parameters #64553
    Area-IDE
  • Don't format regions inside inactive conditionals #64551
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove assert that fires for old CodeStyle NuGet packages #64532
    Area-IDE
  • Take over test coverage for lambda default parameters #64530
    Area-Compilers
  • Wait application idle in navigate to test #64524
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Fix negation of is true and is false patterns with non-Boolean values #64520
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Add and use TargetFramework.Net70 #64490
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64552
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Only start scanning for task-list items once the Task-List window is actually open. #64543
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Create a .NET Core build of the LSIF generator #64521
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Replace recursion with iteration in convert-if-to-switch #64537
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move to a simpler model of writing assets out to OOP #64486
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64539
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge the new UnitTesting solution crawler into Main #64368
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add instrumentation to investigate flakiness in `ConstantFolding_01` #64404
    Test, Flaky, Next
  • Remove unneeded `#pragma warning disable` #64535
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64533
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix "Build Only" diagnostics content in error list #58409
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64529
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64528
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64526
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #64522
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #64112
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #64498
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update ref `foreach` tests #64276
    Area-Compilers, Test, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64519
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64523
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add a new Location.Create overload for external file location with a different mappedLineSpan #64240
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Fix Union to match the semantics of GetApplicableAnalyzers #64484
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #64517
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64518
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Load CompletionProvider from references in background #64352
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64562
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Check value scopes match in ref reassignment #64561
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add symbol key tests #64420
    Area-IDE
  • Simpler bidirectional streaming invocation in OOP. #64494
    Area-IDE
  • Set val escape on expression variables #64414
    Area-Compilers
  • Use the source-built version of ref packs and don't use app host when building in source-build #64055
    Area-Infrastructure, 17.5
  • Support generated-only symbols in SymbolFinder #63377
    Area-IDE
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE
  • Fix VisualStudioMSBuildInstalled attribute #64131
    Area-IDE
  • Caller of an async local function cannot expect any of the callee’s code to execute #64482
    Area-Compilers
  • Support `scoped` keyword in declaration expressions. #64380
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add support for code refactorings and code fixes in non-source files #64364
    Area-Analyzers
  • Catch deconstruction ref escape errors in invocation escape analysis #64470
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Track EA APIs #64487
    Area-Infrastructure
  • use xunit apis for test discovery #64156
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor inserted HTML comment tags cause layout issues #44404
  • Hot reloading with SPA proxy #44403
  • Override `ToString` on the `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.CookieOptions` class. #44401
  • Index Binding doesnt work with IFormFile but works with other types. #44398
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Remove ResponseCookies._enableCookieNameEncoding compat switch #44396
  • Invalid redirect to RedirectUrl on error during 2FA #44395
  • ASP.Net Core 6 gRPC HTTP/2 client TLS problem. #44394
  • [Analyzer] Warn about returning `IEnumerable<T>` from action or minimal API #44391
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Analyzer] Warn about `HttpRequest.Form` #44390

Closed

  • Blazor Components-E2E Pipeline is Broken #44385
    7.0.0
  • [Analyzer] Unused route parameter detection and fixer #44319
  • [Analyzer] Header dictionary indexer analyzer and fixer #44318
  • [Analyzer] RequestDelegate return value detection #44316
  • [Analyzer] Route syntax analyzer #44315
  • Consider to add more details to message about linking #36903
    Backlog
  • Blazor webassembly AuthorizeView component is very slow on page loading #36139
    Backlog
  • asp-validation-for does not insert a message between spans when using BindPropertyAttribute.Name #37266
    Backlog
  • Consider adding 'SPA' keyword to all SPA templates (React, Angular, etc.) #37097
    Backlog
  • Blazor Add Analyzer if JSInvokable Method isn't Public #38080
    Backlog
  • Hot Reload: Adding and Removing components at runtime should not rebuild the app but should be hot reloaded #34476
    Backlog
  • Maui App after update Microsoft.AspNetCore.SignalR.Client to 6.0.8 release build crash without error message #43304
  • Blazor Wasm authentication with identity provider behind reverse proxy using http #44248
    Discussions
  • [RequestHeaderTests] Unit tests always succeed #44249
    Test failures
  • The custom Identity UI Razor Page source should be used in the publish folder, instide of the default UI from RCL after setting RazorCompileOnPublish setup to false. #43909
  • Open IBrowserFile.OpenReadStream() for two different InputFiles leads to timeout #43112
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blank Blazor WASM app fails to publish with PublishTrimmed set to false on .NET 7 RC1 #44038
    7.0.0
  • SignalR parallel client callback results in reduced performance on first invocation #44141
  • `UseStaticFiles` should display the default PhysicalFileProvider default path when using a constructor that doesn't override the default `IFileProvider` #38481
    8.0-preview1
  • Worker Service template project does not run as a windows service without additional steps #44323
  • Blazor WebAssembly navigation behaves differently after publish #44368
  • The scoped css file 'Views\Shared\_Layout.cshtml.css' was defined but no associated razor component or view was found for it. Fake.Web D:\dotNet\FakeMelySite\Fake.Web\Views\Shared\_Layout.cshtml.css 1 #43967
  • ASP.Net Core 6 integration tests with WebApplicationFactory<TStartup>: How to pass program args? #44321
  • Docs: HttpContext fundamentals #26509
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Fix components-e2e pipeline #44406
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Standard stream argument validation #44405
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1

Merged

  • Fix components-e2e pipeline #44402
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Analyzer clean up #44393
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Update comment to say which element is targeted #44400
    area-mvc, auto-merge, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Assert test result #44249 #44388
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/3.1] Switch to consolidated Windows build images and Svc pool #44348
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • Update static file docs and log if WebRootPath is not found #44296
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Document 2F un-escape behavior for HttpRequest.Path #44386

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Publish app not rendering images. #10526

    Backlog

    Backlog

    Backlog

    Backlog

Closed

  • .NET MAUI Blazor mouse events not firing #8393
    7.0
  • Strange code fragments #10517
    Backlog
  • Button text not rendered properly in RTL flow direction #2880
    Backlog
  • Runs in Windows Emulator, Throws System.NullReferenceException error in Android Emulator. Don't know where to start. #10249
  • this.Height is -1 in Page_loaded() in Android Maui. #10281
  • Images and FontImageSource do not display in ios 16 #10392
  • Android Editor doesn't render text the full width of the displayed field #10505
  • Navigation.PopModalAsync fails on Android if page is a NavigationView [.Net7] #10513
  • Backwards tab navigation cannot move focus away from a Windows Forms BlazorWebView #8293
    7.0
  • Blazor CSS Isolation bundle is not deployed to local iOS device #7468
    7.0
  • Blazor App Menu not rendered in IOS #7600
  • Generate unplated icons on Windows #6164
    7.0
  • TabBar control does not function normally in IOS. But it works fine on Android. #8786
  • AppIcon shows a border on windows taskbar #5162
    Backlog
  • Permission Denied returned when approximate location is selected #10053
    Backlog
  • The collectionView Item does not respond to visibility change #10512
  • Workloads installation broken after attempt to install maui from 'main' branch #7008
  • Not able to link .a iOS library #7670
  • Preview Update for 17.3.0 Preview 4 Really hosed my MAUI install #8984
  • SearchBox Background #10357
    Backlog
  • An Android app crashes or hangs when I try to obtain a StackTrace after calling a method via reflection in try/catch block #10216
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't fire appearing/disappearing with window #10530

    7.0

  • Generate unplated icons on Windows #10515

  • Added pending changes to Essentials Permissions from Xamarin.Forms #10092

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CosmosDB Provider with FindAsync + Private Constructor results in Exception #29286
  • DateTime.Now not consistent with client and server with different time zone #29284
  • Global Query Filters for Owned Entities #29283
  • Convert.ToDecimal in Projections #29282
  • Investigate direct support for OpenTelemetry tracing #29281
  • EF7 - GroupBy on Json column property + First/FirstOrDefault generates incorrect SQL #29279

Closed

  • Specify facets and store types in Northwind model #29087
    8.0.0
  • .HasNoKey() and migrations creating tables #29189
  • When EF7 RC is referenced from a Function App, the app throws a runtime error on startup #29123
  • Sqlite: AddTicks translation gives incorrect results #29260
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Validate that if any fragments use table sharing then the main fragments are mapped to the same table #29285
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.0
  • Validate that the main fragment of optional dependents that use table sharing have at least one required non-shared property #29277
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.0
  • MQ: Specify facets and store types in Northwind model #29226
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #29276
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #29272
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [8.0] Fix to #29260 - Sqlite: AddTicks translation gives incorrect results #29274
    auto-merge
  • [release/6.0] Switch to consolidated Windows build images #29269
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
